languages.text: {n}Почуяв тепло разумного существа, невзрачный лист молниеносно вцепился в живую плоть. Если бы вы не уничтожили его... Кто знает, что стало бы с нервной системой и разумом его жертвы всего через несколько секунд.{/n}

{n}Smelling the warmth of a sentient creature, the unsightly leaf latched onto the living flesh with lightning speed. If you had not destroyed it... who knows what would have become of its victim's nervous system and mind in just a few seconds?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Почуяв тепло разумного существа, невзрачный лист молниеносно вцепился в живую плоть. Если бы вы не уничтожили его... Кто знает, что стало бы с нервной системой и разумом его жертвы всего через несколько секунд.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Smelling the warmth of a sentient creature, the unsightly leaf latched onto the living flesh with lightning speed. If you had not destroyed it... who knows what would have become of its victim's nervous system and mind in just a few seconds?{/n}

{n}Smelling the warmth of a sentient creature, the unsightly leaf latched onto the living flesh with lightning speed. If you had not destroyed it... who knows what would have become of its victim's nervous system and mind in just a few seconds?{/n}

{n}Smelling the warmth of a sentient creature, the unsightly leaf latched onto the living flesh with lightning speed. If you had not destroyed it... who knows what would have become of its victim's nervous system and mind in just a few seconds?{/n}

{n}Smelling the warmth of a sentient creature, the unsightly leaf latched onto the living flesh with lightning speed. If you had not destroyed it... who knows what would have become of its victim's nervous system and mind in just a few seconds?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als es die Wärme einer empfindungsfähigen Kreatur spürte, stürzte sich das unansehnliche Blatt blitzschnell auf das lebendige Fleisch. Hättest du es nicht zerstört ... wer weiß, was in wenigen Sekunden aus dem Nervensystem und dem Verstand des Opfers geworden wäre?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Smelling the warmth of a sentient creature, the unsightly leaf latched onto the living flesh with lightning speed. If you had not destroyed it... who knows what would have become of its victim's nervous system and mind in just a few seconds?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Als es die Wärme einer empfindungsfähigen Kreatur spürte, stürzte sich das unansehnliche Blatt blitzschnell auf das lebendige Fleisch. Hättest du es nicht zerstört ... wer weiß, was in wenigen Sekunden aus dem Nervensystem und dem Verstand des Opfers geworden wäre?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sentant la chaleur d'une créature intelligente, l'horrible feuille s'est aussitôt cramponnée à sa chair. Si vous ne l'aviez pas détruite... qui sait quels effets délétères elle aurait produits sur le système nerveux et l'esprit de sa victime en l'espace de quelques secondes ?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Smelling the warmth of a sentient creature, the unsightly leaf latched onto the living flesh with lightning speed. If you had not destroyed it... who knows what would have become of its victim's nervous system and mind in just a few seconds?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sentant la chaleur d'une créature intelligente, l'horrible feuille s'est aussitôt cramponnée à sa chair. Si vous ne l'aviez pas détruite... qui sait quels effets délétères elle aurait produits sur le système nerveux et l'esprit de sa victime en l'espace de quelques secondes ?{/n}

languages.text: {n}知覚ある生物のあたたかさを嗅ぎつけた不気味な葉は、稲妻のごとき素早さで生きている肉体に張り付いた。もしあなたがそれを破壊していなければ…ほんの数秒の間で、犠牲者の神経系と精神が果たしてどうなっていたのか、それは誰にもわらない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Smelling the warmth of a sentient creature, the unsightly leaf latched onto the living flesh with lightning speed. If you had not destroyed it... who knows what would have become of its victim's nervous system and mind in just a few seconds?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}知覚ある生物のあたたかさを嗅ぎつけた不気味な葉は、稲妻のごとき素早さで生きている肉体に張り付いた。もしあなたがそれを破壊していなければ…ほんの数秒の間で、犠牲者の神経系と精神が果たしてどうなっていたのか、それは誰にもわらない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Al percibir el calor de una criatura inteligente, la horrenda hoja se aferró a la carne viva a la velocidad del rayo. De no haberla destruido... ¿quién sabe lo que les habría ocurrido al sistema nervioso y a la mente de la víctima en los próximos segundos?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Smelling the warmth of a sentient creature, the unsightly leaf latched onto the living flesh with lightning speed. If you had not destroyed it... who knows what would have become of its victim's nervous system and mind in just a few seconds?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Al percibir el calor de una criatura inteligente, la horrenda hoja se aferró a la carne viva a la velocidad del rayo. De no haberla destruido... ¿quién sabe lo que les habría ocurrido al sistema nervioso y a la mente de la víctima en los próximos segundos?{/n}

languages.text: {n}这片丑陋的叶子感觉到了某个有知觉生物的体温，随后以闪电般的速度紧紧抓住了猎物的肉体。如果你当初没有把它及时毁掉……天知道受害者的神经系统与思维模式会在短短几秒之内发生什么变化。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Smelling the warmth of a sentient creature, the unsightly leaf latched onto the living flesh with lightning speed. If you had not destroyed it... who knows what would have become of its victim's nervous system and mind in just a few seconds?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这片丑陋的叶子感觉到了某个有知觉生物的体温，随后以闪电般的速度紧紧抓住了猎物的肉体。如果你当初没有把它及时毁掉……天知道受害者的神经系统与思维模式会在短短几秒之内发生什么变化。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bilinçli bir varlığın ısısını sezen çirkin yaprak, ışık hızıyla canlı bedene yapışıyor. Onu yok etmeseydin kim bilir kurbanının sinir sistemine ve aklına, hem de birkaç saniyede neler olurdu...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Smelling the warmth of a sentient creature, the unsightly leaf latched onto the living flesh with lightning speed. If you had not destroyed it... who knows what would have become of its victim's nervous system and mind in just a few seconds?{/n}
